meanings.definition: A univalent hydrocarbon radical, C6H5, derived from benzene.
meanings.sent1: The chemist studied the structure of the phenyl group in the molecule.
meanings.sent2: She added a phenyl group to the compound to change its properties.
meanings.sent3: The phenyl radical decided to join forces with the methyl group for a chemical reaction.
meanings.sent4: In the world of molecules, the phenyl group was the star of the show.
meanings.sent5: The phenyl radical stood out with its unique shape and properties.
